===Overview===
The '''Bolsheviks''', were a  faction founded by [[Vladimir Lenin (Earth-616)|Vladimir Lenin]] and Alexander Bogdanov. After forming their own party in 1912, the Bolsheviks took power during the [[Russian Revolution]] in November 1917, overthrowing the liberal government after the abdication of Tsar [[Nikolai II Alexandrovich Romanov (Earth-616)|Nicholas II]], and became the only ruling party in the [[Soviet Union]]. They considered themselves the leaders of the revolutionary working class of [[Russia]].{{r|X-Men: Colossus Bloodline Vol 1 1}}
===Events===
On October 25th leftist revolutionaries led by Bolshevik Party leader [[Vladimir Lenin (Earth-616)|Vladimir Lenin]] launched coup d’état against the Duma's provisional government. They arrested the royal family and took them to a house in Tolbusk. The family were later executed in the basement. The youngest daughter Anastasia escaped to [[Berlin]] but paused away in hospital.{{r|Strange Tales Vol 1 24}}
